solution_line_template: Half the original number of trash cans in Veteran's Park is {original_veterans_park_cans}/{half_divisor}=<<{original_veterans_park_cans}/{half_divisor}={half_veterans_park_cans}>>{half_veterans_park_cans} trash cans.

Thus Central Park originally had {more_than_half} more than half the number of trash cans as what was originally in Veteran's Park, or {half_veterans_park_cans}+{more_than_half}=<<{more_than_half}+{half_veterans_park_cans}={original_central_park_cans}>>{original_central_park_cans} trash cans.

Half of the trash cans from Central Park is {original_central_park_cans}/{half_divisor_central_park}=<<{original_central_park_cans}/{half_divisor_central_park}={cans_moved_to_veterans_park}>>{cans_moved_to_veterans_park} trash cans.

After the addition of the {cans_moved_to_veterans_park} new cans, there are now {original_veterans_park_cans}+{cans_moved_to_veterans_park}=<<{original_veterans_park_cans}+{cans_moved_to_veterans_park}={final_veterans_park_cans}>>{final_veterans_park_cans} trash cans in Veteran's Park.
